element.title: Warranty Operations/Field Eng. Management
element.body: Company Siemens Energy, Inc. Division SEI - Renewable Energy, Wind Power Functional Area FS - Field Service Location TX - Houston Job Type Regular Job Time Full-Time Experience Level Mid Level Required Education Bachelors Degree Required Travel 50% Company Description Siemens Energy is the worldâ€™s leading supplier of a complete spectrum of products, services and solutions for the generation, transmission and distribution of power and for the extraction, conversion and transport of oil and gas. In fiscal 2007 (ended September 30, based on IFRS), the Energy Sector had revenues of approximately EUR20 billion and received new orders totaling around EUR28 billion and posted a profit of EUR1.8 billion. Siemens Energy had a work force of 73,500 at the beginning of fiscal 2008.

element.title: Director
element.body: Job Responsibilities and Requirements: Director of Underwriting Practices,Renewable Energy Practice, Industry Markets About The HartfordThe Hartford is one of the oldest and largest investment and insurance companies in the United States. Founded in 1810, The Hartford is a leading provider of automobile and homeowners products, business insurance, investment products, life insurance, and group & employee benefits. Recognized for the diversity of its product portfolio and distribution networks, The Hartford serves customers through independent agents and brokers, financial institutions, affinity groups and via the Internet. Approximately 11,000 independent agencies and more than 100,000 registered broker/dealers sell the company's products. The company has approximately 30,000 employees in the U.S. and serves customers worldwide. At year end 2008, total assets and total stockholders' equity of The Hartford were $287.6 billion and $9.3 billion, respectively.

element.title: Senior Level Deepwater Drilling Technologist
element.body: Job Responsibilities and Requirements: Drilling and Completions at ChevronChevron holds strategic positions in some of the world largest and most productive oil and gas regions. The approximately 1,400 people in the Drilling & Completions (D&C) team work in some of the world most challenging technical and operating environments. The D&C Clear Leader philosophy provides a passion for safety and environmental protection, leadership for the development of new and innovative drilling and completions technology, and a commitment to the education and development of our workforce. Chevron North America Exploration and Production Company, a division of Chevron U.S.A. is accepting online applications for the position of a Senior Level Deepwater Drilling Technologist (Technologist CL 84), located in Houston, Texas. OverviewThe Deepwater Drilling Technologist position is part of Chevron Global Deepwater Drilling Group and will support the Deepwater Exploration and Projects Strategic Business Unit in Houston, Texas.

element.title: Independent Energy Consultants
element.body: Who do you know that uses electricity or natural gas? Do you think they would like to pay less for those services? How would you like to make a recurring income by showing people how to save money on their energy bills every month? Electricity is a service everyone needs and already uses. You can choose your energy provider, so why pay more? You can create a recurring monthly income with Ambit Energy. With guaranteed lower prices, no switching fees, and free rewards, Ambit Energy will sell itself. You just have to get the word out. Be open to change and invest in yourself. It is time to seize your destiny and get ahead financially. Free online training and support will enable you to find the path to your dreams by building a recession-proof income. This is a real opportunity if you are willing to work for it. Come join our growing team and power your future. Visit my website to learn more. Www.oldsenergy.energy526.com

element.title: Occupation Health & Hygiene Manager
element.body: Job Responsibilities : Medical assessment standards and processesMedical care and injury / illness case managementSet minimum standards for medical providersSet minimum qualifications and experience for site-based Medical professionalsManage the Global drug and alcohol testing programOccupational Hygiene standards and processesAnalysis and reporting of key performance measures for occupational health and hygieneMonitoring compliance with occupational health and hygiene requirements across PetroleumValidate Petroleum Occupational and Hygiene data prior to issueEnsure compliance with, and provide advice on, OSHA injury classification and reportingManage Houston office medical clinic. Job Requirements : 10 years experience in the oil and gas industryExperience implementing and managing drug and alcohol testing processesAssurance activities (Audits and Reviews)Strong written and verbal communication with excellent influencing skillsWell developed interpersonal skills.

element.title: Mgr Proposals Ii
element.body: Job Responsibilities:This position manages the group tasked with generating the technical proposals in support of the Cameron Shales products. Either directly or through subordinates, the Proposals Manager-High Spec provides equipment and system process designs and other technical information for proposals and also supplies information and support for cross-Product Lines projects (Integrated Projects). As the Proposals Manager, the individual is responsible for the following, either directly or through subordinates Concise definition of the project scope of work Successful completion of technical portion of proposalsProcess design of equipment for proposals Verification of process design of equipment for in-house projects Development of proposal P&ID's, and review of in-house project P&ID's Establish process design requirements for purchased equipment

element.title: Mgr Proposals Ii
element.body: Job Responsibilities:This position manages the group tasked with generating the technical proposals in support of the Cameron Shales products. Either directly or through subordinates, the Proposals Manager-High Spec provides equipment and system process designs and other technical information for proposals and also supplies information and support for cross-Product Lines projects (Integrated Projects). As the Proposals Manager, the individual is responsible for the following, either directly or through subordinates Concise definition of the project scope of work Successful completion of technical portion of proposalsProcess design of equipment for proposals Verification of process design of equipment for in-house projects Development of proposal P&ID's, and review of in-house project P&ID's Establish process design requirements for purchased equipment

element.title: Operations Engineer
element.body: Job Responsibilities : This support shall be in the nature of:(Support) Providing technical guidance and a single point contact to District operations personnel. (Support) Provide estimates, design review, encroachment policy requirements and coordination on encroachment projects within the Division(Optimization) Optimization support of the utilization of major asset components, and support of business development function of Transportation, value chain optimization support and interface with and support the Logistics Optimization Team(Environmental) Own the Division Spill Prevention Plan tracking and identification spreadsheet for Division Spill Prevention Plan(Asset Integrity/Risk Management) Supporting PIR personnel and Operations management in the establishment of system maintenance plans and guidelines to maximize asset integrity and minimizing risk

element.title: Representative
element.body: Job Responsibilities : Installs, services and repairs customer equipment. Performs warranty and recall work. B. Performs testing, calibration, checking, correcting, adjusting and part component replacement services on customer products. Constructs and tests circuits and equipment utilizing various tools and machines such as computers, workstations, circuit diagrams and test instruments/equipment. C. Instructs customers and sales personnel on the operation and customer maintenance of equipment. Provides technical support in product service, product training and applications. D. Analyzes malfunctions in equipment and interprets maintenance manuals, using knowledge of systems and electronics to isolate and correct the fault. Consults with product support and engineering personnel to determine solutions to unusual problems in system operation. E Reports customer suggestions on product improvement and existing product designs to the appropriate technical specialist.

element.name: Are You Looking for a Gas
